input_text:
Job Title: Senior Graphic Designer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
About us:Syndica is creating the Cloud of Web3. We offer enterprise-grade RPC infrastructure and developer tools tailored for the Solana ecosystem. Syndica powers some of the most important applications in Web3 - we take this role seriously. Joining our team means you'll be held to a high standard and challenged technically while growing close to a group of some of the smartest and most passionate individuals in crypto.
We are backed by strategic partners, investors, and advisors who are all-in on our mission: Chamath of Social Capital, Steve Jang of Kindred Ventures, Joe McCann of Asymmetric, Coinbase Ventures, Solana Ventures, Circle Ventures, and many more.
About you:5+ years of related professional experienceFigma and Adobe Creative Cloud proficiency (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, Premiere)Demonstrated graphic design expertise, layout skills, creativity, and flexibilityDeadline-oriented
Standout Experience:SVG animationsVideo creationsContent creation for social mediaBachelor’s degree in graphic design, arts, or industrial design

About the role:As a founding member of the Graphic Design Team, you will have the primary accountability of developing best practices for design on Syndica’s SaaS platform and social media profiles. Graphic design experience is a necessity! Each member of the team is responsible for initializing concepts and developing them using a variety of design software, all while working with team stakeholders to drive them to completion.
A successful candidate must have demonstrable experience in creative design vision and execution. You will work closely with various stakeholders across the team to create forward-thinking designs and be the go-to design expert. The ideal candidate will have SaaS platform experience and an interest in building out the next generation of web3 infrastructure!

Key responsibilities: Work with stakeholders to create branding across different platformsDesign forward-thinking design assets to be used on the Syndica website, social media, and other print material as neededCreate mockups on Figma on a timely basis/cadenceWork closely with leadership and frontend team to project manage and help determine product goalsWork with the front-end team to design, mock, and implement beautiful UI/UX
What does success in this role look like?In three months, you have become our go-to design expert and work seamlessly across different departments to contribute beautiful designs on time.In six months, you have helped build a world-class design aesthetic as the founding design team member.In twelve months, you have a thorough understanding of leadership’s brand vision and have established a cadence of predictable, on-time delivery without cutting corners.
Want to stand out? Take a look at our research blogs and create an updated cover image to include in your application.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Senior Graphic Designer
output_json.summary: Join Syndica, a leading provider of enterprise-grade RPC infrastructure and developer tools for the Solana ecosystem.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, arts, or industrial design
optional_skills: Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, Premiere)
job_responsibilities: Develop best practices for design on Syndica’s SaaS platform and social media profiles
Work with stakeholders to create branding across different platforms
Design forward-thinking design assets for the Syndica website, social media, and other print material
Create mockups on Figma on a timely basis
Work closely with leadership and frontend team to project manage and help determine product goals
Work with the front-end team to design, mock, and implement beautiful UI/UX

Syndica powers some of the most important applications in Web3 - we take this role seriously. Joining our team means you'll be held to a high standard and challenged technically while growing close to a group of some of the smartest and most passionate individuals in crypto.

other.content: 5+ years of related professional experience, Figma and Adobe Creative Cloud proficiency, demonstrated graphic design expertise, layout skills, creativity, and flexibility, deadline-oriented
SVG animations, Video creations, Content creation for social media
